function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contact with health care workers caring for COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to infection control measures and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment","People":"Health care workers, patients","Owner":"Health care organizations"},{"Description":"Contact with patients diagnosed positive for SARS-CoV-2 virus infection","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Isolation of infected individuals, contact tracing, and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Isolation units, contact tracing technologies","People":"General population, health care workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, health care organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of enhanced infection control measures in various activities with suspected or confirmed cases, samples, material, and waste","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Develop and enforce clear infection control protocols, provide training, and monitor compliance","Technologies":"Infection control protocols, training programs","People":"Health care workers, laboratory staff, waste management personnel","Owner":"Health care organizations, research institutions, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of regular COVID-19 infection risk assessment","Impact":"Failure to identify and address emerging risks and changes in transmission dynamics","Mitigation":"Regularly conduct COVID-19 risk assessments, update protocols, and communicate findings effectively","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, communication platforms","People":"Public health authorities, decision-makers, health care organizations","Owner":"Public health authorities, health care organizations"}]}
